field_speakers.processed:

Moderator: Prof. Andrew Mertha, George and Sadie Hyman Professor of China Studies and the Inaugural Director of the SAIS Global China Research Center

field_description.processed:
Join us on Wednesday, November 17th, from 5:00-6:30 PM (EST), 2:00 â€“ 4:30 PM (PT), for the third part of our China Methodology Workshop Series, Relearning the Lost Arts of China Scholarship, featuring Dr. Thomas Fingar, Shorenstein APARC Fellow of the Freeman Spogli Institute for International Studies at Stanford University. The event is open to the SAIS/Johns Hopkins community and to the broader public. Registration is required.
